name: torchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sounding like or suitable for a torch song (= a song about love or about people in love): He made his name as a torchy singer of late-night ballads. She sang a couple of torchy songs with a piano accompaniment.
More examplesFewer examplesThey closed the show with the torchy title track from their latest album.The highlight of the evening was a torchy rendition of "Fever".She sings in a torchy register that is much lower than most other female singers.
